barbarian.name: Barbarian
barbarian.hit points:
First level: 12 + Constitution Modifier
After First: 1d12 (or 7) + your Constitution Modifier per Barbarian level
barbarian.skill proficiencies:
Choose two from:
Animal Handling
Athletics
Intimidation
Nature
Perception
Survival
barbarian.equipment:
(a) a greataxe or (b) any martial melee weapon
(a) two handaxes or (b) any simple weapon
An explorer's pack and four javelins
barbarian.subclasses:
Path of the Beast (UA)
Path of the Berserker
Path of the Wild Soul
